trans-unit.resname: PS18·14 | Gideon of the Trials | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Gideon of the Trials
trans-unit.target: Gideon of the Trials

trans-unit.resname: PS18·14 | Gideon of the Trials | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: [+1]: Until your next turn, prevent all damage target permanent would deal.
trans-unit.target: [+1]: Until your next turn, prevent all damage target permanent would deal.

trans-unit.resname: PS18·14 | Gideon of the Trials | Card Text | Paragraph 2
trans-unit.source: [0]: Until end of turn, CARDNAME becomes a 4/4 Human Soldier creature with indestructible that's still a planeswalker. Prevent all damage that would be dealt to him this turn.
trans-unit.target: [0]: Until end of turn, CARDNAME becomes a 4/4 Human Soldier creature with indestructible that's still a planeswalker. Prevent all damage that would be dealt to him this turn.

trans-unit.resname: PS18·14 | Gideon of the Trials | Card Text | Paragraph 3
trans-unit.source: [0]: You get an emblem with "As long as you control a Gideon planeswalker, you can't lose the game and your opponents can't win the game."
trans-unit.target: [0]: You get an emblem with "As long as you control a Gideon planeswalker, you can't lose the game and your opponents can't win the game."

trans-unit.resname: PS18·60 | Jace, Cunning Castaway | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Jace, Cunning Castaway
trans-unit.target: Jace, Cunning Castaway

trans-unit.resname: PS18·60 | Jace, Cunning Castaway | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: [+1]: Whenever one or more creatures you control deal combat damage to a player this turn, draw a card, then discard a card.
trans-unit.target: [+1]: Whenever one or more creatures you control deal combat damage to a player this turn, draw a card, then discard a card.

trans-unit.resname: PS18·60 | Jace, Cunning Castaway | Card Text | Paragraph 2
trans-unit.source: [−2]: Create a 2/2 blue Illusion creature token with "When this creature becomes the target of a spell, sacrifice it."
trans-unit.target: [−2]: Create a 2/2 blue Illusion creature token with "When this creature becomes the target of a spell, sacrifice it."

trans-unit.resname: PS18·60 | Jace, Cunning Castaway | Card Text | Paragraph 3
trans-unit.source: [−5]: Create two tokens that are copies of CARDNAME, except they're not legendary.
trans-unit.target: [−5]: Create two tokens that are copies of CARDNAME, except they're not legendary.

trans-unit.resname: PS18·106 | Liliana, Untouched by Death | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Liliana, Untouched by Death
trans-unit.target: Liliana, Untouched by Death

trans-unit.resname: PS18·106 | Liliana, Untouched by Death | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: [+1]: Mill three cards. If at least one Zombie card is milled this way, each opponent loses 2 life and you gain 2 life.
trans-unit.target: [+1]: Mill three cards. If at least one Zombie card is milled this way, each opponent loses 2 life and you gain 2 life.

trans-unit.resname: PS18·106 | Liliana, Untouched by Death | Card Text | Paragraph 2
trans-unit.source: [−2]: Target creature gets -X/-X until end of turn, where X is the number of Zombies you control.
trans-unit.target: [−2]: Target creature gets -X/-X until end of turn, where X is the number of Zombies you control.

trans-unit.resname: PS18·106 | Liliana, Untouched by Death | Card Text | Paragraph 3
trans-unit.source: [−3]: You may cast Zombie spells from your graveyard this turn.
trans-unit.target: [−3]: You may cast Zombie spells from your graveyard this turn.

trans-unit.resname: PS18·110 | Chandra, Torch of Defiance | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Chandra, Torch of Defiance
trans-unit.target: Chandra, Torch of Defiance

trans-unit.resname: PS18·110 | Chandra, Torch of Defiance | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: [+1]: Exile the top card of your library. You may cast that card. If you don't, CARDNAME deals 2 damage to each opponent.
trans-unit.target: [+1]: Exile the top card of your library. You may cast that card. If you don't, CARDNAME deals 2 damage to each opponent.

trans-unit.resname: PS18·110 | Chandra, Torch of Defiance | Card Text | Paragraph 2
PS18·110 | Chandra, Torch of Defiance | Card Text | Paragraph 3
trans-unit.source: [−3]: CARDNAME deals 4 damage to target creature.
trans-unit.target: [−3]: CARDNAME deals 4 damage to target creature.

trans-unit.resname: PS18·110 | Chandra, Torch of Defiance | Card Text | Paragraph 4
trans-unit.source: [−7]: You get an emblem with "Whenever you cast a spell, this emblem deals 5 damage to any target."
trans-unit.target: [−7]: You get an emblem with "Whenever you cast a spell, this emblem deals 5 damage to any target."

trans-unit.resname: PS18·163 | Nissa, Vital Force | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Nissa, Vital Force
trans-unit.target: Nissa, Vital Force

trans-unit.resname: PS18·163 | Nissa, Vital Force | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: [+1]: Untap target land you control. Until your next turn, it becomes a 5/5 Elemental creature with haste. It's still a land.
trans-unit.target: [+1]: Untap target land you control. Until your next turn, it becomes a 5/5 Elemental creature with haste. It's still a land.

trans-unit.resname: PS18·163 | Nissa, Vital Force | Card Text | Paragraph 2
trans-unit.source: [−3]: Return target permanent card from your graveyard to your hand.
trans-unit.target: [−3]: Return target permanent card from your graveyard to your hand.
